casebody.data:
DISCRETIONARY APPEALS ALLOWED

98-2577. Hubbard v. Canton City School Bd. of Edn.

Stark App. No. 1998CA00089. The discretionary appeal is allowed on Proposition of Law No. I, and the cause is consolidated with 98-2667, Hubbard v. Canton City School Bd. of Edn., Stark App. No. 1998CA00089, with no additional briefing.

Lundberg Stratton, J., would also allow on Proposition of Law No. II. Pfeifer, J., dissents.
